name: Product.SubscriptionInfo.RenewalInfo
desc: The renewal information for an auto-renewable subscription.

items.name: let originalTransactionID: UInt64
items.desc: The transaction identifier of the original purchase.

items.name: let currentProductID: String
items.desc: The subscription product ID that the customer is subscribed to.

items.name: let autoRenewPreference: String?
items.desc: The product ID of the subscription that will automatically renew.

items.name: let state: Product.SubscriptionInfo.RenewalState
items.desc: The renewal state of the auto-renewable subscription.

items.name: let willAutoRenew: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the subscription will automatically renew in the next period.

items.name: let offerID: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies an offer applied to the next subscription period.

items.name: let offerType: Transaction.OfferType?
items.desc: The subscription offer type for the next subscription period.

items.name: let deviceVerification: Data
items.desc: The device verification value you use to verify whether the renewal information belongs to the device.

items.name: let deviceVerificationNonce: UUID
items.desc: The UUID used to compute the device verification value.

items.name: let signedDate: Date
items.desc: The date that the App Store signed the JWS renewal information.

items.name: let priceIncreaseStatus: Product.SubscriptionInfo.RenewalInfo.PriceIncreaseStatus
items.desc: The status that indicates whether a customer has accepted a price increase to a subscription.

items.name: var jsonRepresentation: Data
items.desc: The raw JSON representation of the subscription renewal information.

items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.
